issue.title: First Chunk of ported Parquet Code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12045](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12045). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After breaking up the port of Parquet to Go into multiple chunks, this card represents the initial chunk of utilities and framework code. To be followed up by subsequent chunks.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12045?focusedCommentId=17309711) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9671
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9671>
